attributes.action: review freedom of speech legislation, and make it clear that freedom to think and say what you want is protected
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There have been some recent cases in the press of protestors being accosted for expressing an opinion.  This is censorship.

Obviously hate legislation should be in place for those people inciting murder, rape, beatings, discrimination etc, but there should be no corporate body or religion (man-made or divine) above criticism.

When religions start to become protected from criticism, then we move into an era  where freedom of speech will be denied.  

The West has grown due to individuals taking a stand for what they believe in.  Current legislation allows such individuals to be censored.
